metadata.title: CVE-2018-14681 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in kwajd_read_headers in mspack/kwajd.c inlibmspack before 0.7alpha. Bad KWAJ file header extensions could cause aone or two byte overwrite.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14681` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmspack package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7-1').
